H0.text: Sun is an object in the sky that is a satellite of the planet Earth.

H1.text: The Moon is the object in the sky that is a satellite of the planet Earth.

H2.text: Mars, an object in the sky, is a satellite of the planet Earth.

H3.text: Saturn is the object in the sky that is a satellite of the planet Earth.

A4.text: The Moon is the only natural satellite of Earth.
